_header: Listen mild Wrought our bones with weeping
_description: William Herebert’s paraphrase of the hymn, ‘Audi benigne conditor’ — ten lines

BLAdd46919.First Lines: Lustne mylde wrouhte oure bones wyth weepingeIn þys holy uastinge vourti dawes lestynge…
BLAdd46919.Last Lines: …Graunte ous holy trinite þat in godhede art onþat þe ȝyft of leyntes vast not fol boe to mon
BLAdd46919.Attributed Author: Herebert (written by original hand in margin beside first line, f. 210v)
BLAdd46919.Attributed Title: Audi benigne conditor (centered above text, f. 210v)
